page.title: 17Education in Montrose Area.
page.content: In the{Hillside and Borrowfield areas to the north of Montrose there are two {primary schools.}Hillside School is a 4 teacher school with 81 pupils. It stands on a shared site with the church and the village hall.Today, the classes are all composite with P1/2, 2/3/4, 4/5/6, and 6/7. Borrowfield Primary School stands in it's own grounds and was built in 1977. It is semi open plan in design and has four separate buildings,an office and gym block,infant,senior school and nursery. The school has 409 pupils,16 teachers with 2 classes at each stage. The curriculum covers language,maths, environmental studies, and aesthetic arts as well as catering for the childrens physical education. The children from both these schools complete their secondary education in Montrose Academy.
